summary: Level 1 Female Nord Saved right outside the cave exiting Helgen.
descriptionHtml:
Level 1 Female Nord Can change with Console Command by hitting Tilde key ~ and typing showracemenu.

[left][/left]Saved right outside the cave exiting Helgen. Hearthfire, Dragonborn, and Dawnguard DLC is required but nothing else was used no patches or mods of any kind.

Everything cleaned with TES5Edit before play.

Only things loaded during play.

GameMode=Skyrim

Skyrim.esm=1
Update.esm=1
Dawnguard.esm=1
HearthFires.esm=1
Dragonborn.esm=1
HighResTexturePack01.esp=1
HighResTexturePack02.esp=1
HighResTexturePack03.esp=1

There is a optional save that is also a 001 save right outside the cave at Helgen that does not have any DLC at all not even the High Res DLC the only thing required for that one is Skyrim.esm and Update.esm ( Update.esm was cleaned with TES5Edit) so this is a completely clean save!
author: Valaria69
